title: Lions fan sues DK Metcalf, others for $100 million after altercation

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Lions fan sues DK Metcalf, others for $100 million after altercation
sources.description: Ryan Kennedy is seeking damages against DK Metcalf, the Steelers and more after an altercation between him and Metcalf at a game on Dec. 21.
